data.message:
I'm soo inspired by Eminem that I started doing rap. :D
"I spend my whole life tryin' to win her heart,
Her fancy talkin' it's not that I forget that part,
The bitch only took my heart just to break it apart,
Always assuring me that she's only mine,
Still feel that ich like a leech on my fuckin' spine,
Do you think I need you once more in my life,
After what you did stabbing me in my back with a fuckin' knife,
Well bitch you so naive,
Cuz now no man wanna make you his wife,
So do take my advice and hide yourself in some bitches hive."
